Author: AtmoOmen
Name: Currency Tracker
Changelog:
(English / 简体中文)
- Modified the way transactions are displayed, which now effectively reduces the performance consumption caused by large amounts of data
  修改了记录的显示方式，现在可以有效降低数据量过大时造成的性能消耗
- Added a function to merge transactions of the same location by threshold value
  新增了按临界值合并相同地点记录的功能
- Added a function to clear exceptional transactions
  新增了移除异常记录的功能
